dcterms:creator: Goran Glavaš
Robert Litschko
Sebastian Ruder
Ivan Vulić
dcterms:description: GT-BLI is a dataset constructed semi-automatically from Google Translate, comprising 28 language pairs with a good balance of typologically similar and distant languages.
dcterms:title: GT-BLI

dcterms:creator: David Kamholz
Jonathan Pool
Susan M. Colowick
dcterms:description: PanLex-BLI focuses on BLI evaluation for lower-resource languages, deriving training and test data from PanLex.
dcterms:title: PanLex-BLI

dcterms:creator: Ivan Vulic
Simon Baker
Edoardo Maria Ponti
Ulla Petti
Ira Leviant
Kelly Wing
Olga Majewska
Eden Bar
Matt Malone
Thierry Poibeau
Roi Reichart
Anna Korhonen
dcterms:description: Multi-SimLex is a large-scale evaluation of multilingual and crosslingual lexical semantic similarity, comprising cross-lingual datasets of 2k-4k scored word pairs over 66 language pairs.
dcterms:title: Multi-SimLex

dcterms:creator: Wenxuan Zhou
Fangyu Liu
Ivan Vulic
Nigel Collier
Muhao Chen
dcterms:description: XL-BEL is a benchmark for cross-lingual biomedical entity linking, requiring the model to link an entity mention to entries in a language-agnostic medical knowledge base.
dcterms:title: XL-BEL
